hero_title: Patient, friendly tech help for seniors
hero_lead: Home tutoring for senior citizens — start offline, continue online. We guide you step-by-step with phones, computers, streaming, email, safety, and more.
offline_visit_desc: We come to you for a relaxed, in-person session. We learn your goals and set up your devices together.
online_followup_desc: Short video calls to refresh skills, answer questions, and practice at your pace.
family_friendly_desc: Invite your grandchild to join. The first joint session is free so you can learn together.
members_chat_desc: We’re planning a simple, private chat for members to ask questions and help each other. For now, you’ll get a phone/WhatsApp number after booking.
seminars_desc: We host sessions at old-age homes and community centers.
book_prompt: Tell us what you’d like help with. We’ll get back within 24 hours.
label_what_learn: What do you want to learn?
privacy_note: We respect your privacy. We never share your details.
online_safety_desc: We help you stay safe from scams, protect passwords, and use privacy controls.
tv_streaming_desc: Learn to use your TV, streaming services, and entertainment apps.
smartphones_desc: Master your phone: calls, apps, photos, and accessibility features.
email_otp_desc: Set up email accounts, manage messages, and understand security codes.
social_media_desc: Connect with family and friends safely on social platforms.
big_picture_desc: Understand the digital world: internet, AI, and everyday technology.
pricing_subtitle: Pricing for everyone. Choose your plan now!
